profile-page.title: Profile
profile-page.principal-message: I'm a web developer focused on the Frontend, I have knowledge of backend technologies like PHP, Node, and Java concepts with Spring Boot. I have almost 2 years of experience with web development with the standar stack (HTML, CSS and Javascript). I have work in a e-commerce partner company using Vtex platform and I was learned many concepts of that world. I be able to give my opinion with suggestions and fundamentals, to come a really good decision in front of a client or a project. I want to continue my knowledge path to reach the level of software architect or lead a Frontend teamüë®üèΩ‚Äçüíª.
